forecastday.fcttext: Sun and clouds mixed. High 71F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High 67F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High 71F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph.
